title: Menu Holder, 1905-6
markings: On top surface of U-shaped horizontal element; "Rd. 45330," then "L" "&" "Co." each in a diamond-shaped box, then three silver marks for Birminham, sterling, and date letter "f" for 1905
provenance: 2013, Given to Cooper-Hewitt by owner Harry C. Sigman
description: Round enameled in blue, green and red ornament on the face with pierced Celtic motifs on each side; back-rest supported by a U-shaped horizontal element.

tombstone.epitaph: Menu Holder, 1905-6.Silver, enamel. Gift of Harry C. Sigman. 2013-21-21.
